channel.title: Nixos on Nothing interesting...
channel.description: Recent content in Nixos on Nothing interesting...

item.title: Slashpackage binaries compiled with Musl
item.description: I was fooling around with NixOS and it was a bit trickier to compile the binaries I was interested in. So I cobbled together a rudimentary slashpackage manager based off the work of Paul Jarc. The work was fairly complete for C programs, but it seems to be mostly abandoned at this point. Slashpackage binaries can be used on any system and are convenient for custom upgrades. All binaries are installed in /package and symlinked to /command or /package/host/…/command.
